name: Hatris (itch)
description:
Ahh.. Tetris... classic game, ya like that right, if so....

I made a different type of tetris...

introducing...

Hatris!

the """"Tetrominos"""" are now nonsensical & might result frustrating failures

but if you are a professional, this game might be a new start for ya

enjoy!

Shapes:

4 block Line (I) , 3 block equal (=), A+ (if you know you know) , A dot, [ & ] (idk how to describe [ or ])
